name: Bosquiman Technologies
tag_list: bosquiman-com, social-network, climbing, mountaineering, nature, open-source, elgg
description: Start up focused on Social Networks
overview:
Bosquiman Tehnologies is an start up created by a group of three pasionate Spanish engineers, who love technologies and Nature.

How could we combine Technologies and Nature? Bosquiman was the answer!

The general focus of the company is to create niche Social networks, mainly related with sports, Nature, active live, adventure and outdoor activities. Those Social Networks will stablish a social point to share the passion for the matter, knowledge, experiencies, information, pictures and videos.

The base of our networks is open source. it will be powered by elgg.

The information shared with all our users will be created mainly by the users, but a great part of our efforts will also be invested on the creation of high quality contents, and the implementation of tools for our expert users to control content quality.

Nowadays we are launching Bosquiman.com that intends to be the social network for Mountaineers starting with rock climbing.

This is only the begining for us: we want to offer our users all the posibilities to share their passion not only across their computers but also using their mobiles, ebooks, TV, etc…. But we need to go step by step.
